ValidationRule.description: Agency bill - Need Endorsement Documents Uploaded before moving to Bind Order Sent or Delivered to Insured
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c &&
AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( Stage__c , "Delivered to Insured"), ISPICKVAL( Stage__c , "Bind Order Sent") ),
ISCHANGED(Stage__c), Endorsement_Docs_Uploaded__c = FALSE
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Error: Need Endorsement Documents Uploaded before bind order sent or delivered to insured
